includedAssets.title: Superman
includedAssets.synopsis: Superman fights to thwart criminal Lex Luther's (Gene Hackman) plans for world domination. Christopher Reeve stars as the Man of Steel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Superman fights to thwart criminal Lex Luther's (Gene Hackman) plans for world domination. Christopher Reeve stars as the Man of Steel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Superman fights to thwart criminal Lex Luther's (Gene Hackman) plans for world domination. Christopher Reeve stars as the Man of Steel.

includedAssets.title: Superman II
includedAssets.synopsis: In the finest of Christopher Reeve's four outings as the Man of Steel, Superman squares up to the despicable General Zod (Terence Stamp) and his cosmic hench-baddies (mute giant Jack O'Halloran and vampy Sarah Douglas). Banished from Krypton when Supes was a nipper, the terrible trio are back with a vengeance to rule planet Earth... with a little help from arch-fiend Lex Luther (Gene Hackman). First class villainy and more romantic bumbling with Margot Kidder's Lois Lane make Richard Lester's super-sequel a triumphant mix of characterisation and action. The battles between our underpanted hero and the tyrannical tag team cannot be beat.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Man of Steel Christopher Reeve sacrifices his powers to be with Lois Lane, but needs them back to defeat Terence Stamp's evil General Zod.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the finest of Christopher Reeve's four outings as the Man of Steel, Superman squares up to the despicable General Zod (Terence Stamp) and his cosmic hench-baddies (mute giant Jack O'Halloran and vampy Sarah Douglas). Banished from Krypton when Supes was a nipper, the terrible trio are back with a vengeance to rule planet Earth... with a little help from arch-fiend Lex Luther (Gene Hackman). First class villainy and more romantic bumbling with Margot Kidder's Lois Lane make Richard Lester's super-sequel a triumphant mix of characterisation and action. The battles between our underpanted hero and the tyrannical tag team cannot be beat.

includedAssets.title: Superman III
includedAssets.synopsis: Christopher Reeve returns for the third high-flying adventure for Clark Kent... alias Kal-El, the Krypton kid... alias Superman. This time, the hero with the external pants battles a megalomaniac tycoon (Robert Vaughn) who is using a bumbling computer genius (Richard Pryor) to plan the crime of the century. Zippy, zesty threequel in which Margot Kidder almost stays out of trouble as Lois Lane and Supes finds himself wrestling with his dual identity - literally.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tech whizz Richard Pryor helps develop a powerful red kryptonite which splits Superman in two. Will his heroic persona or his evil side win out?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Christopher Reeve returns for the third high-flying adventure for Clark Kent... alias Kal-El, the Krypton kid... alias Superman. This time, the hero with the external pants battles a megalomaniac tycoon (Robert Vaughn) who is using a bumbling computer genius (Richard Pryor) to plan the crime of the century. Zippy, zesty threequel in which Margot Kidder almost stays out of trouble as Lois Lane and Supes finds himself wrestling with his dual identity - literally.

includedAssets.title: Superman IV - Quest For Peace
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Supes versus nukes as Krypton's favourite son (Christopher Reeve) seeks to disarm the world of Nuclear Man, the latest despicable brainchild of his nemesis Lex Luthor (Gene Hackman). Reeves' final outing in Clark Kent's clogs is a daftly entertaining blast of super-hokum involving tussles with his radioactive opponent that take them from the Great Wall of China to the Moon. They obviously took so much out of Nuclear Man that Mark Pillow - the Yorkshire-born former Chippendale who played him - barely surfaced again. Jon Cryer plays the stooge as Luthor's dopey nephew.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a bid to protect the world from nuclear weapons, Superman takes on Lex Luther's latest creation - Nuclear Man. Action adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Supes versus nukes as Krypton's favourite son (Christopher Reeve) seeks to disarm the world of Nuclear Man, the latest despicable brainchild of his nemesis Lex Luthor (Gene Hackman). Reeves' final outing in Clark Kent's clogs is a daftly entertaining blast of super-hokum involving tussles with his radioactive opponent that take them from the Great Wall of China to the Moon. They obviously took so much out of Nuclear Man that Mark Pillow - the Yorkshire-born former Chippendale who played him - barely surfaced again. Jon Cryer plays the stooge as Luthor's dopey nephew.

includedAssets.title: Superman Returns
includedAssets.synopsis: There's little rust on the Man of Steel and his reappearance after swooping into cinemas in 1978 barely shows signs of mental fatigue. Brandon Routh winningly forges a rough approximation of Christopher Reeve's Superman even if Kate Bosworth is miscast as his former lover Lois Lane. Lex Luther's (Kevin Spacey) world domination plans veer on the barking while X-Men director Bryan Singer conjures up the odd off-kilter moment and a splendid crashing plane setpiece above New York.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Superman blasts back into action to do battle with his arch-nemesis, but can evil Lex Luthor temper the Man of Steel?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There's little rust on the Man of Steel and his reappearance after swooping into cinemas in 1978 barely shows signs of mental fatigue. Brandon Routh winningly forges a rough approximation of Christopher Reeve's Superman even if Kate Bosworth is miscast as his former lover Lois Lane. Lex Luther's (Kevin Spacey) world domination plans veer on the barking while X-Men director Bryan Singer conjures up the odd off-kilter moment and a splendid crashing plane setpiece above New York.

includedAssets.title: Superman Anthology Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Christopher Reeve is the Man of Steel and Gene Hackman his nemesis Lex Luthor in four classic adventures, before Brandon Routh becomes the legendary DC Comics superhero to take on Kevin Spacey's Luthor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Christopher Reeve is the Man of Steel and Gene Hackman Lex Luthor in four classic adventures, before Brandon Routh battles Kevin Spacey's Luthor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Christopher Reeve is the Man of Steel and Gene Hackman his nemesis Lex Luthor in four classic adventures, before Brandon Routh becomes the legendary DC Comics superhero to take on Kevin Spacey's Luthor.

includedIn.title: Superman
includedIn.synopsis: An orphaned alien becomes Earth's greatest hero as he fights to save his home from evil industrialist Lex Luthor and deadly enemies from his past.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: An orphaned alien becomes Earth's greatest hero as he fights to save his home from evil industrialist Lex Luthor and deadly enemies from his past.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: An orphaned alien becomes Earth's greatest hero as he fights to save his home from evil industrialist Lex Luthor and deadly enemies from his past.
